title: Get the status of an async report task

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. Please use the same access token as the /report/task/create/ point.

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: Advertiser ID. Note : If you use advertiser_ids when calling /report/task/create/ (POST method), you need to set this field to one of the Advertiser IDs specified via advertiser_ids .

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The ID of the asynchronous report task. You can get the ID via the response of /report/task/create/ endpoint.
